quotes.quote: Goals give us direction. They put a powerful force into play on a universal, conscious, and subconscious level. Goals give our life direction.
We are not retreating we are advancing in another direction.
Sometimes it's the journey that teaches you a lot about your destination.
For all the compasses in the world, there's only one direction, and time is its only measure.
The wisest men follow their own direction.
It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
A little push at the right direction, can make a big difference.
The great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving.
The best path through life is the highway.
Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
Directions are instructions given to explain how. Direction is a vision offered to explain why.
Direction determines destination.
Your direction is more important than your speed.
Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex. It takes a touch of genius and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
A lack of direction and meaning can leave you empty.
It is the direction and not the magnitude which is to be taken into consideration.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
No matter how long you have travelled in the wrong direction, you can always turn around.
The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future life.
If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
Life is a journey, not a destination, we determine our destiny by the direction we take.
You cannot expect to stay on the right path if you are walking with the wrong people.
You can choose a direction that will take you into something that isn't going to take you where you want to go, or you can choose another direction which is down the right pathway.
You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
If the things behind you are tripping you, you're moving in the wrong direction.
If you lose direction, go to a higher ground.
The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
Each step in the right direction allows you to see further in that direction.

You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own, and you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.
It is better to walk alone than with a crowd going in the wrong direction.
Read the directions and directly you will be directed in the right direction.
Direction is only necessary when your destination is certain but the path to get there isn't clear to you.
If we are facing in the right direction, all we have to do is keep on walking.
Often times we cannot change the entire direction of a route already set in motion. But we can do our small part to shift the path one degree at a time.
Any direction you walked was forward, and that was as must be.
There’s no shame in changing direction.
The only person to influence the direction and purpose of your life is the one who gave it. God!
Your decisions today, both big and small, determine the direction your life will take tomorrow.

Stopping to consider whether our choices will take us in the right direction is important. But sometimes we head in a direction we know is the wrong one, moving farther away from the story we want to tell.
Direction, not intention, determines destination.
Each decision should move closer to becoming all that God made you to be, to turn your life in the direction of a story you'll be happy to share.
If there's a goal you want to achieve, you have to make decisions that will move you in the direction you want to go.
Just like most of us, had to hit rock bottom before he woke up and obeyed the call of God on his life. At times God has to send a storm to get us to go in the right direction.
God will bring about direction, conviction, clarification, inspiration, and revelation, and He will give you wisdom to make decisions that will help you live the best life you can live.
Sometimes gut instinct is what determines the direction we should take.
Sharing a clear and concise vision spawns a sense of purpose and direction. It attracts success toward you and helps you build an expanding team.
It is not where one is, but in what direction he is going.
Not knowing what I needed to do or where I needed to go, I knew all the same that I was going in the right direction.
Everything has a vibration that spirals inward or outward — and everything turns together in the same direction at the same time.
If you miss the way to a great destination, just look for those going to that direction.

In the world as it is, torn with agonies and dissensions, we need some direction for our souls which is never away from us; which, without enslaving us or narrowing our vision, enters into every detail of our life.
"Seek and ye shall find"; that seems to be the quintessence of all spiritual direction for everyone.
Our choices decide our direction and carve a path for our personal lives and our careers.
People at any stage will profit by taking the wheel and getting pointed in the right direction.
When you're a light instead of a dim switch, your brightness radiates in every direction.
Without sense of purpose and clear direction of your life, you will only be building a fake brand of you.
